Nick's Blog

Ubiquity command to create BackPack reminders

28 October 2008

I've been using Ubiquity more and more lately. The most recent use is for BackPack integration through the available API. This command allows you to create really quick reminders by creating a "reminder" command. It took about 20 minutes to read through the docs and figure out what needed to be done and overall I'm impressed with how easy it is to add functionality to it. I wonder how easy it would be to integrate intranet/corporate functionality.

To use this command open the "command-editor" using the Ubiquity prompt and enter this into text area. You'll have to update the three variables at the top of the script before you can use it.
